descriptionType.name: descriptionType

options.name: Set Automatically
options.description: Automatically set based on resource and operation

options.name: Set Manually
options.description: Manually set the description

descriptionType.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.ai_hint: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often

resource.name: resource
resource.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

operation.name: operation

options.name: Create
options.description: Create a invoice

options.name: Get
options.description: Get a invoice

options.name: Get Many
options.description: Get many invoices

options.name: Update
options.description: Update a invoice

operation.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

organizationId.name: organizationId
organizationId.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
organizationId.ai_hint: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

additionalFields.name: additionalFields

options.name: brandingThemeId
options.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

options.name: currency
options.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

options.name: currencyRate
options.description: The currency rate for a multicurrency invoice. If no rate is specified, the XE.com day rate is used.

options.name: date
options.description: Date invoice was issued - YYYY-MM-DD. If the Date element is not specified it will default to the current date based on the timezone setting of the organisation.

options.name: dueDate
options.description: Date invoice is due - YYYY-MM-DD

options.name: expectedPaymentDate
options.description: Shown on sales invoices (Accounts Receivable) when this has been set

options.name: Exclusive
options.description: Line items are exclusive of tax

options.name: Inclusive
options.description: Line items are inclusive tax

options.name: NoTax
options.description: Line have no tax

options.name: plannedPaymentDate
options.description: Shown on bills (Accounts Payable) when this has been set

options.name: reference
options.description: ACCREC only - additional reference number (max length = 255)

options.name: sendToContact
options.description: Whether the invoice in the Xero app should be marked as "sent". This can be set only on invoices that have been approved.

options.name: url
options.description: URL link to a source document - shown as "Go to [appName]" in the Xero app

additionalFields.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.ai_hint: Max number of results to return

options.name: options
createdByMyApp
options.description: Whether you'll only retrieve Invoices created by your app

options.name: orderBy
options.description: Order by any element returned

options.name: where
options.description: The where parameter allows you to filter on endpoints and elements that don't have explicit parameters. Examples Here.

options.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

updateFields.name: updateFields

options.name: brandingThemeId
options.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

options.name: currency
options.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

options.name: currencyRate
options.description: The currency rate for a multicurrency invoice. If no rate is specified, the XE.com day rate is used.

options.name: date
options.description: Date invoice was issued - YYYY-MM-DD. If the Date element is not specified it will default to the current date based on the timezone setting of the organisation.

options.name: dueDate
options.description: Date invoice is due - YYYY-MM-DD

options.name: expectedPaymentDate
options.description: Shown on sales invoices (Accounts Receivable) when this has been set

options.name: Exclusive
options.description: Line items are exclusive of tax

options.name: Inclusive
options.description: Line items are inclusive tax

options.name: NoTax
options.description: Line have no tax

options.name: lineItemsUi
options.description: Line item data

values.name: lineItemId
values.description: The Xero generated identifier for a LineItem

values.name: description
values.description: A line item with just a description

values.name: unitAmount
values.description: Lineitem unit amount. By default, unit amount will be rounded to two decimal places.

values.name: itemCode
values.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

values.name: accountCode
values.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

values.name: taxAmount
values.description: The tax amount is auto calculated as a percentage of the line amount based on the tax rate

values.name: lineAmount
values.description: The line amount reflects the discounted price if a DiscountRate has been used

values.name: discountRate
values.description: Percentage discount or discount amount being applied to a line item. Only supported on ACCREC invoices - ACCPAY invoices and credit notes in Xero do not support discounts.

options.name: plannedPaymentDate
options.description: Shown on bills (Accounts Payable) when this has been set

options.name: reference
options.description: ACCREC only - additional reference number (max length = 255)

options.name: sendToContact
options.description: Whether the invoice in the Xero app should be marked as "sent". This can be set only on invoices that have been approved.

options.name: url
options.description: URL link to a source document - shown as "Go to [appName]" in the Xero app

updateFields.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

type.name: type

options.name: Bill
options.description: Accounts Payable or supplier invoice

options.name: Sales Invoice
options.description: Accounts Receivable or customer invoice

type.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

values.name: description

values.description: Lineitem unit amount. By default, unit amount will be rounded to two decimal places.

values.name: itemCode
values.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

values.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

values.name: lineAmount

values.name: discountRate
values.description: Percentage discount or discount amount being applied to a line item. Only supported on ACCREC invoices - ACCPAY invoices and credit notes in Xero do not support discounts.

lineItemsUi.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

conditional_rules: IF descriptionType == 'manual' THEN SHOW parameter 'toolDescription'
IF resource == 'contact' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'contact' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'organizationId'
IF resource == 'contact' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'name'
IF resource == 'contact' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'contact' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'organizationId'
IF resource == 'contact' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'contactId'
IF resource == 'contact' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'organizationId'
IF resource == 'contact' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'contact' AND operation == 'getAll' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'contact' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF resource == 'contact' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'organizationId'
IF resource == 'contact' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'contactId'
IF resource == 'contact' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'updateFields'
IF resource == 'invoice' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'invoice' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'organizationId'
IF resource == 'invoice' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'type'
IF resource == 'invoice' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'contactId'
IF resource == 'invoice' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'lineItemsUi'
IF resource == 'invoice' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'invoice' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'organizationId'
IF resource == 'invoice' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'invoiceId'
IF resource == 'invoice' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'updateFields'
IF resource == 'invoice' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'organizationId'
IF resource == 'invoice' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'invoiceId'
IF resource == 'invoice' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'organizationId'
IF resource == 'invoice' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'invoice' AND operation == 'getAll' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'invoice' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
